question: Which state has recently reduced the retirement age of government employees to 58 years?
explanation:
The state of Punjab has recently announced during the state budget that it has reduced the retirement age of government employees to 58 years from the current limit of 60 years.
This step is expected to boost jobs in the state. The Finance Minister of the state also announced the state government will provide free education in government schools to all students up to Class 12.
